entry.title: 3M Automix 8227 - Automix Smooth Material Compound/Fibreglass Repair Adhesive 0 6.8 Fl. Oz. (200 ml) 7000120466
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fillers
Price: 82.53

[shortdesc]

3M Automix Smooth Material Compound/Fibreglass Repair Adhesive, 08227, 6.8 fl. oz. (200 ml)

  • 3M™ Automix Smooth Material Compound/Fibreglass Repair Adhesive is a two-part epoxy used to adhere backup strips and patches to smooth material compound and traditional fibreglass
  • This adhesive has a 4 minute work time, a 30 minute handling time and 2 hour cure time
  • The 3M™ Manual Applicator, 08117, or the 3M™ Pneumatic Applicator, 09930, are the recommended applicator guns.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Brand 3M

    Application Bonding
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Fillers
    Volume 200 ml

    Product Information

  • Automatic mixing and metering
  • 4 minute work time
  • 30 minute handling time
  • Dynamic mixing

    • Suggested Application

entry.title: 3M 8272 - Sheet Molded Compound & Fibreglass Repair Adhesive 0 Green 10 13.5 Fl. Oz. (400 ml) 7000142711
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fibreglass Repair
Price: 112.43

[shortdesc]

3M Sheet Molded Compound & Fibreglass Repair Adhesive, 08272, green, 10, 13.5 fl. oz. (400 ml)

  • 3M™ Sheet Molded Compound/Fibreglass Repair Adhesive is a high performance, two-part urethane used to bond sheet molded compound (SMC), and fibreglass reinforced polyester (FRP) body panels to each other and to metal frames
  • Metal must be primed with a 3M™ Two-Part Epoxy Primer, 08278 before adhesive application.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Adhesive Type Urethane
    Application Bonding
    Color Green, White
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Fibreglass Repair
    Volume 400 ml

    Product Information

  • High performance
  • Excellent sag resistance
  • Two-part urethane adhesive
  • Bondable to metal and fibreglass
  • Fast drying
  • Automatic mixing
  • 1 minute worktime

    • Suggested Application

  • Used to bond SMC and FRP (traditional fibreglass) body panels to each other and to metal frames
    		•

entry.title: 3M Bondo B-00404C - Bondo Fibreglass Resin 404 3 Quart (3.4 L) 7100053794
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fibreglass Resin
Price: 79.64

[shortdesc]

Bondo Fibreglass Resin, 404C, 3 qt (3.4 l)

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Resin is the same high-strength polyester resin that is used to build most boats
  • Can be used alone or with fibreglass tape, cloth or mat to repair damaged fibreglass boats, snowmobiles, jet skis, bathtubs and showers.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Bondo
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Fibreglass Resin

    Extra Product Information

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Resin can also be used as a sealer on damaged and rotted wood
  • It works to seal concrete, is great on large or small metal rust-outs and joins most surfaces together while creating a strong and long lasting bond.

    • Product Information

  • Use during stage 2 of the 3M™ Body Repair System
  • Waterproof
  • Compatible with all paints, including gel coat and marine paints
  • Includes 3M™ Liquid Hardener
  • Sandable in less than two hours
  • Paste-like consistency

    • Suggested Application

  • Repairs damaged fibreglass boats, snowmobiles, jet skis, bathtubs or showers
  • Seals damaged and rotted wood, concrete and is great on large or small metal rust-outs
    		•

entry.title: 3M Bondo B-00488 - Bondo Fibreglass Mat 488 8 Sq. Ft. (2.5 m) 7000120013
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fibreglass
Price: 6.26

[shortdesc]

Bondo Fibreglass Mat, 488, 8 sq. ft. (2.5 m)

  • Slightly thicker than the Bondo® Fibreglass Cloth, the Bondo® Fibreglass Mat is recommended when additional strength is required on more severe repairs like larger holes and cracks
  • To use, cut each piece of Bondo® Fibreglass Mat to size and build layers as needed
  • When used with Bondo® Fibreglass Resin, repairs are 100% waterproof, making the products ideal for tub, shower, sink, pool, hot tub, boat repair and more
  • This product can also be used on additional surfaces such as wood, concrete and metal to provide extremely strong, durable and waterproof repairs.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Bondo
    Color White
    Length 8 ft
    Origin Country China
    Product Type Fibreglass
    Size 8 sq. ft.

    Product Information

  • Use during stage 2 of the 3M™ Body Repair System
  • Will not rust or rot
  • Ideal for projects of all sizes
  • Flexible mat allows for easy repairs to contoured surface

    • Suggested Application

  • Designed for tub, shower, sink, pool, hot tub, boat repair, and more
  • Can be used on multiple surfaces including concrete, wood, fibreglass, metal and more

entry.title: 3M Bondo-Glass B-00274C - Bondo-Glass Reinforced Filler 274C 1 Gallon (3.79 L) 7000120082
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fillers
Price: 66.22

[shortdesc]

Bondo-Glass Reinforced Filler, 274C, 1 gal (3.79 l)

  • Bondo® Glass Reinforced Filler is great for use on fibreglass, wood, metal, aluminum, SMC, and masonry and is compatible with all paint systems
  • Half-inch, interlocking fibreglass strands create strength and make Bondo® Glass the ideal filler for repairing small (dime size or smaller) holes or rust-outs
  • The fibreglass strands in the filler allow you to cover holes and eliminate the need for backing strips, fibreglass mat, or cloth.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Bondo-Glass
    Application Surface and Rust Out Repair
    Color Green
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Fillers
    Volume 1 gal

    Extra Product Information

  • Works great on boats! Eliminates the need for backing strips, fiberglass resin or cloth on small holes and rusted-out areas
  • Sandable in only 20 minutes and compatible with all paint systems
  • Waterproof
  • Includes Red Cream Hardener
  • Sold in Canada only.

  • Use during stage 2 of the 3M™ Body Repair System
  • Sands in only 20 minutes
  • Includes cream hardener

entry.title: 3M Bondo B-00422C - Bondo Fibreglass Resin Repair Kit 422C 7100054071
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Compounds
Price: 29.99

[shortdesc]

Bondo Fibreglass Resin Repair Kit, 422C

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Repair Kit is a do-it-yourself solution for easy and effective auto body repair
  • Users can repair cracked, broken or rusted automobile body components quickly, easily and at a fraction of the cost versus part or panel replacement
  • The kit includes resin and hardener for a permanent, waterproof seal that hardens in as little as two hours and is compatible with any paint.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Bondo
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Compounds

    Extra Product Information

  • Bondo® Fibreglass Repair Kit includes: 852 mL (29 oz) fiberglass resin, 11 mL (0.4 oz) liquid hardener, plastic spreader and fiberglass mat

    • Product Information

  • Use during stage 2 of the 3M™ Body Repair System
  • Non-shrinking polyester resin bonds to metals and plastics
  • Hardens quickly for fast repairs
  • Includes directions for easy, trouble-free use
  • Do-it-yourself auto body repair at a fraction of the time and cost

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for auto body repair applications

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fillers
Price: 29.50

[shortdesc]

3M Reinforced Filler, 05877, 9.3 fl. oz. (276 ml)

  • 3M™ Reinforced Filler, 05877, is a two-component, resin-rich filler formula, containing milled fibreglass
  • It offers excellent adhesion to steel, galvanized steel, aluminum, e-coat, sheet molded compound (SMC), fibreglass reinforced polyester (FRP), concrete and wood substrates, and provides additional strength when deeper fill and gap spanning capability is needed
  • Designed to simplify the mixing and application process, this filler is ideal for waterproof repairs to holes and rust
  • 3M™ Reinforced Filler, 05877, is intended for use with the 3M™ Dynamic Mixing Applicator, 05846.
